metadata.title: Noqta
metadata.description: Noqta is a powerful yet simple note-taking app designed for clarity and productivity. Capture ideas, organize thoughts, and never lose track of what's important.

hero.headline: Your Second Brain,
hero.description: Noqta is a powerful yet simple note-taking app designed for clarity and productivity. Capture ideas, organize thoughts, and never lose track of what's important.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to capture, organize, and find your notes effortlessly.

quickNoteCreation.title: Quick Note Creation
quickNoteCreation.description: Create notes instantly with auto-save. Never lose your thoughts again.

powerfulSearch.title: Powerful Search
powerfulSearch.description: Find any note in seconds by searching titles, content, or tags.

smartOrganization.title: Smart Organization
smartOrganization.description: Organize with folders, tags, and custom colors for visual clarity.

builtInTodos.title: Built-in To-Dos
builtInTodos.description: Create checklists within notes to track tasks and stay productive.

richTextEditor.title: Rich Text Editor
richTextEditor.description: Format your notes with bold, italic, headings, lists, and code blocks.

pinFavorite.title: Pin & Favorite
pinFavorite.description: Keep important notes at the top and mark favorites for quick access.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Seamless dark/light theme switching for comfortable note-taking anytime.

smartTrash.title: Smart Trash
smartTrash.description: Deleted notes stay in trash for 30 days before permanent removal.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Power-user shortcuts: Ctrl+N for new note, Ctrl+K for search, and more.
